emailActivation.subject: Sermed amaynut-inek di Tassili Art
emailActivation.body: Anṣuf yiswen di Tassili Art! Iwakken ad tgeḍ amejmuɛ n yifenniyen akked timahilin n tneflit, ḥeqqed amiḍan-inek. Sit ɣef tqeffalt-agi akken ad tkemmleḍ asenqed:
emailActivation.alt: Ma yella tqeffalt ur tetteddu ara, nɣel ɣer iminig-inek aseɣwen-agi akken ad tesermed amiḍan-inek di Tassili Art.

emailReset.subject: Ales awennez n wawal n uɛeddi n Tassili Art
emailReset.body: Tesutreḍ ad terrezed awal-inek n uɛeddi di Tassili Art. Sit ɣef tqeffalt-agi akken ad tkemmleḍ tamhelt:
emailReset.alt: Ma ur tesutreḍ ara asenqed-agi, tzemreḍ ad ttruḍ izen-agi.

emailInformativo.subject: Tilɣa timaynutin si Tassili Art
emailInformativo.body: Wali tilɣa timaynutin d leqdic n Tassili Art. Snifel iɣefsen, imennayen d timahilin timaynutin di tneflit-nneɣ.
emailInformativo.alt: Ma yella tqeffalt ur tetteddu ara, rzu ɣer usmel-nneɣ web i wugar n telɣut.

auth.password_too_short: Awal uffir ilaq ad yili d talat 6 n isekkilen.

post.created_post: Nerra awen-d ameslay, tarbaɛt-nneɣ tettεaṛed. Ad k·m-nenɣer m'ara tettwaqebbel.
post.search_failed: Aneqqis n iseqdacen ur yeddi ara.

lang.userNotFoundOrAlreadyUpdated: Aseqdac ulac-it neɣ tutlayt yakan tettwaleqqed
lang.errorSavingLanguageForVisitor: Tuccḍa deg ukers n tutlayt i unebdad

cart.priceMustBeNumber: Ssuma ilaq ad tili d amḍan
cart.priceMustBePositive: Ssuma ilaq ad tili d imeɣli
cart.quantityAtLeastOne: Amḍan ilaq ad yili d wayen yegdan 1

email.subject: Jamal Art
email.title: Ansuf γer tnezzut n Tassili
email.body: Tifrat! Aql-ak·kem tebγiḍ tesεiḍ asnas. Rzu γer tqeffalt neɣ aseγwen ades i wakken ad tseγdeḍ imayl-ik·im.
email.alt: Ma ulac tqeffalt tettwarnam, tzemreḍ ad tzuγeḍ aseγwen-a:

activation_email_sent: Imayl n usegmed yettwazen γer tansa-ik·im.

role.role_assigned: Aγerfi n useqdac yettwasbadu akken ilaq

message.invalid_data: Talɣut d tarameɣtut: ilaq ad yili umara d ugbur n yizen
message.createMessage.empty: Izen ur izmir ad yili d aberkan.

user.activation_request_sent: ✅ Asuter n usegmed yettwazen γer umaεiul

user.account_deleted_unverified: Amiḍan-ik·im yettwakkes imi ur isεed ara deg 3 wussan. Mmel tikelt nniḍen i wakken ad tkecmeḍ.
